sqlQuery.name: HTSStrainsTable
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct snp.source_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' AS project_id, b.source_id as isolate_source_id, var.strain as strain, var.allele, CASE WHEN snp.gene_strand = 'reverse' THEN apidb.reverse_complement(var.allele) WHEN snp.gene_source_id is null THEN '' ELSE var.allele END as allele_gene_strand, decode(var.strain, snp.reference_strain, 1, 2) as strain_order, var.product, var.coverage, var.read_percent as read_frequency, CASE WHEN b.source_id is null THEN '' ELSE lower(snp.project_id) || '/?name=' || nas.source_id || ':' || to_char(snp.location - 50) || '..' || to_char(snp.location + 50) || ';l=' || d.name || ';h_region=' || nas.source_id || ':' || to_char(snp.location) || '..' || to_char(snp.location + 1) || '@red' END as view_align, CASE WHEN b.source_id is null THEN '' ELSE 'view alignment' END as has_align, d.name FROM apidbtuning.SnpAttributes snp, apidb.SequenceVariation var, study.study s, rad.studybiomaterial sb, study.biomaterial b, dots.nasequence nas, SRES.externaldatabase d, sres.externaldatabaserelease r WHERE snp.na_sequence_id = var.ref_na_sequence_id AND snp.location = var.location AND nas.na_sequence_id = snp.na_sequence_id AND var.external_database_release_id = b.external_database_release_id(+) AND b.bio_material_id = sb.bio_material_id(+) AND sb.study_id = s.study_id(+) --and s.external_database_release_id = r.external_database_release_id AND r.external_database_id = d.external_database_id AND r.EXTERNAL_DATABASE_RELEASE_ID = var.EXTERNAL_DATABASE_RELEASE_ID ORDER BY strain_order, var.strain

SELECT distinct * FROM ( SELECT snp.source_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' AS project_id, b.source_id as isolate_source_id, var.strain as strain, var.allele, CASE WHEN snp.gene_strand = 'reverse' THEN apidb.reverse_complement(var.allele) WHEN snp.gene_source_id is null THEN '' ELSE var.allele END as allele_gene_strand, var.product, var.coverage, bmc.value as haplogroup, CASE WHEN bmc.value = '6a' THEN 6 WHEN bmc.value = '6b' THEN 6 WHEN bmc.value = 'unknown' THEN 0 ELSE to_number(bmc.value) END as order_num, var.read_percent as read_frequency, var.p_value as pvalue, CASE WHEN b.source_id is null THEN '' ELSE lower(snp.project_id) || '/?name=' || nas.source_id || ':' || to_char(snp.location - 50) || '..' || to_char(snp.location + 50) || ';l=' || d.name || ';h_region=' || nas.source_id || ':' || to_char(snp.location) || '..' || to_char(snp.location + 1) || '@red' END as view_align, CASE WHEN b.source_id is null THEN '' ELSE 'view alignment' END as has_align, d.name FROM apidbtuning.SnpAttributes snp, apidb.SequenceVariation var, study.study s, rad.studybiomaterial sb, Study.Ontologyentry oe, Study.Biomaterialcharacteristic Bmc, study.biomaterial b, dots.nasequence nas, SRES.externaldatabase d, sres.externaldatabaserelease r WHERE snp.na_sequence_id = var.ref_na_sequence_id AND snp.location = var.location AND nas.na_sequence_id = snp.na_sequence_id AND var.external_database_release_id = b.external_database_release_id(+) and Bmc.Bio_Material_Id = b.Bio_Material_Id AND Bmc.Ontology_Entry_Id = Oe.Ontology_Entry_Id AND b.bio_material_id = sb.bio_material_id(+) AND sb.study_id = s.study_id(+) --AND s.external_database_release_id = r.external_database_release_id AND r.external_database_id = d.external_database_id AND r.EXTERNAL_DATABASE_RELEASE_ID = var.EXTERNAL_DATABASE_RELEASE_ID AND oe.category ='BioMaterialCharacteristics' AND oe.value ='Haplogroup' --ORDER BY order_num, var.strain UNION SELECT snp.source_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' AS project_id, b.source_id as isolate_source_id, var.strain as strain, var.allele, CASE WHEN snp.gene_strand = 'reverse' THEN apidb.reverse_complement(var.allele) WHEN snp.gene_source_id is null THEN '' ELSE var.allele END as allele_gene_strand, var.product, var.coverage, decode (var.strain, 'ME49', '2', 'unknown') as haplogroup, CASE WHEN bmc.value is null THEN 0 ELSE to_number(bmc.value) END as order_num, var.read_percent as read_frequency, var.p_value as pvalue, CASE WHEN b.source_id is null THEN '' ELSE lower(snp.project_id) || '/?name=' || nas.source_id || ':' || to_char(snp.location - 50) || '..' || to_char(snp.location + 50) || ';l=' || d.name || '_' || var.strain || ';h_region=' || nas.source_id || ':' || to_char(snp.location) || '..' || to_char(snp.location + 1) || '@red' END as view_align, CASE WHEN b.source_id is null THEN '' ELSE 'view alignment' END as has_align, d.name FROM apidbtuning.SnpAttributes snp, apidb.SequenceVariation var, study.study s, rad.studybiomaterial sb, Study.Ontologyentry oe, Study.Biomaterialcharacteristic Bmc, study.biomaterial b, dots.nasequence nas, SRES.externaldatabase d, sres.externaldatabaserelease r WHERE snp.na_sequence_id = var.ref_na_sequence_id AND snp.location = var.location AND nas.na_sequence_id = snp.na_sequence_id AND var.external_database_release_id = b.external_database_release_id(+) AND b.bio_material_id = sb.bio_material_id(+) AND sb.study_id = s.study_id(+)
and Bmc.Bio_Material_Id(+) = b.Bio_Material_Id AND Bmc.Ontology_Entry_Id = Oe.Ontology_Entry_Id(+)
--AND s.external_database_release_id = r.external_database_release_id AND r.external_database_id = d.external_database_id AND r.EXTERNAL_DATABASE_RELEASE_ID = var.EXTERNAL_DATABASE_RELEASE_ID AND oe.category is null AND oe.value is null and snp.REFERENCE_STRAIN = var.strain ) order by order_num, strain

sqlQuery.name: AlleleCount
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT snp.source_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' AS project_id, count(*) as allele_count, var.allele FROM apidbtuning.SnpAttributes snp, apidb.sequencevariation var WHERE snp.na_sequence_id = var.ref_na_sequence_id AND snp.location = var.location GROUP BY snp.source_id, var.allele ORDER BY var.allele

sqlQuery.name: ProductCount
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT snp.source_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' AS project_id, count(*) as product_count, var.product FROM apidbtuning.SnpAttributes snp, apidb.sequencevariation var WHERE snp.na_sequence_id = var.ref_na_sequence_id AND snp.location = var.location AND var.product is not null GROUP BY snp.source_id, var.product ORDER BY var.product

sqlQuery.name: Providers
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT sb.source_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' AS project_id, sa.source_id as snpchip_source_id, ed.name FROM dots.Snpfeature sa, dots.nalocation la, apidb.snp sb, sres.externaldatabase ed, sres.externaldatabaserelease edr WHERE sa.na_sequence_id = sb.na_sequence_id and sa.na_feature_id = la.na_feature_id and la.start_min = sb.location and sb.source_id != sa.source_id and sa.external_database_release_id = edr.external_database_release_id and edr.external_database_id = ed.external_database_id and sa.name in ('Broad_barcode','Broad_3k_chip','Broad_hd_array')

sqlQuery.name: AllResults
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT c.source_id, c.project_id, c.wdk_weight FROM $$snps_answer$$ c

sqlQuery.name: ApiProjectSnps
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT c.source_id, c.project_id, c.wdk_weight FROM $$snps_answer$$ c, ApidbTuning.SnpAttributes sa where sa.source_id = c.source_id and sa.project_id = $$Project$$

sqlQuery.name: AllSnpRecords
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT sa.source_id, sa.project_id FROM ApidbTuning.SnpAttributes sa
